vision_analysis.question_text: You mentioned you have natural gas appliances in your home. Which of the following do you have? Please exclude appliances powered by bottle gas (LPG).
clickable_elements: Gas flued heater/ gas log fire
Gas home heating (e.g. ducted heating or underfloor heating)
Gas outdoor heater or outdoor fireplace
